/hr/charts.damoun.dev-home-assistant.title: home-assistant helm release
/hr/charts.damoun.dev-home-assistant.name: home-assistant

0:
default_config:
recorder:
  db_url: !env_var uri
http:
  use_x_forwarded_for: true
  trusted_proxies:
    - "10.0.0.0/8"

/hr/charts.damoun.dev-home-assistant.doc:
Home Assistant

Home Assistant is a home automation platform that has many integrations. It can be used to control lights, fans, thermostats, cameras, and many other devicesn

0:
haproxy.org/whitelist: "${HAPROXY_WHITELIST}"
haproxy.org/response-set-header: |
  Strict-Transport-Security "max-age=31536000"
  X-Frame-Options "DENY"
  X-Content-Type-Options "nosniff"
  Referrer-Policy "no-referrer-when-downgrade"
